title: Colorado Opportunity Scholarship Initiative
description: To provide scholarship support for Colorado residents pursuing education at UCCS or PPCC.
marketingContent:
Every dollar donated to this fund will be matched 1:1 by the State of Colorado, up to $1.78m dollars.

The goal of the Colorado Opportunity Scholarship Initiative is to increase postsecondary credential completion and the preparedness of El Paso County Students to earn a livable wage, graduate with less debt and positively contribute to the growth of our stateâ€™s economy. The scholarship Initiative seeks to create a strong network of career and college readiness programs across at UCCS or PPCC, and to increase the amount of total scholarship giving available for postsecondary students.
